Added method moveByTenor without a spot lag to allow tenor calculation based on the CURRENT date and not the spot lag.

Valid Range via HolidayCalendar. HolidayCalendar should replace the simple Set<E> of dates for holidays. A HolidayCalendar MAY contain an eraly and late boundary, if the calculation break a boundary, an exception is thrown, if there are no boundaries no exception would be thrown. This would ensure that calculations are not going outside the valid set of holidays.
The calculation of Spot date should take into account holidays BETWEEN now and spot (aka moveByBusinessDay).
